meanings.definition: A member of a dark-skinned group of peoples originally native to sub-Saharan Africa.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient artifacts made by negroids.
meanings.sent2: Negroids have a rich cultural heritage that spans centuries.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, John dressed up as a negroid warrior.
meanings.sent4: Her family tree traced back to a line of proud negroids.
meanings.sent5: In the documentary, they explored the traditions of negroids in Africa.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Negroid racial classification.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the negroid features of the skull.
meanings.sent2: Negroid art often reflects the beauty of African landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a stunning negroid-inspired collection.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph showed a group of negroid individuals.
meanings.sent5: The music festival celebrated negroid culture through dance and song.
